title: Oh No, Step Bro... I'm Your Wife
description: The gang discusses the etiquette of paying for a hookup's uber, learn  how they make sex noises in movies, and design the perfect jerk off  room. They also invent drone porn and hear from a listener that missed  some cues at Trevor's show.
itunes:author: Trevor Wallace and Michael Blaustein
dc:creator: Trevor Wallace and Michael Blaustein
